title: An Oriental Odyssey - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Gender Bender   Historical   Mystery   Romance   Wuxia
tags: Adapted to Drama   Ancient China   Bickering Couple   Buddhism   Cute Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Legends   Love Rivals   Love Triangles   Master-Servant Relationship   Mystery Solving   Playful Protagonist   Royalty   Tomboyish Female Lead   Unconditional Love
author: Miao Juan   缪娟
description:
In Tang Dynasty, the chivalrous eldest daughter of the Assistant Minister of Revenue, Ye Yuan’an, saves Mu Le, an amnesiac young man of mysterious identity. 

Yuan’an takes Mu Le in as a family servant, and the latter swears his loyalty to her. Along with Zhao Lanzhi, a constable, the trio solve case after case together. 

… But what is Mu Le’s true identity?>
